0.text: Innate: Brand's abilities apply a stack of Ablaze to enemies hit for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and stacking up to 3 times. Subsequent abilities used against a target with Ablaze are empowered. Killing an enemy afflicted with Ablaze or with an ability restores 20 − 40 (based on level)  mana.
0.html: Innate: Brand's abilities apply a stack of Ablaze to enemies hit for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and stacking up to 3 times. Subsequent abilities used against a target with Ablaze are empowered. Killing an enemy afflicted with Ablaze or with an ability restores 20 − 40 (based on level)  mana.
markedPassages: 20 − 40 (based on level)  mana
mana

1.text: Ablaze: While afflicted with Ablaze, the target is dealt magic damage equal to「 2.5% of their maximum health over 3.25 seconds. 」「 0.83% of their maximum health every 1.083 seconds over 3.25 seconds. 」Ablaze deals 120% damage per tick to  monsters, capped at 80.
1.html: Ablaze: While afflicted with Ablaze, the target is dealt magic damage equal to「 2.5% of their maximum health over 3.25 seconds. 」「 0.83% of their maximum health every 1.083 seconds over 3.25 seconds. 」Ablaze deals 120% damage per tick to monsters, capped at 80.
markedPassages: 「 2.5% of their maximum health over 3.25 seconds. 」「 0.83% of their maximum health every 1.083 seconds over 3.25 seconds. 」
「 2.5% of their maximum health over 3.25 seconds. 」
「 0.83% of their maximum health every 1.083 seconds over 3.25 seconds. 」
「 0.83% of their maximum health every 1.083 seconds over 3.25 seconds. 」
monsters

2.text: Upon applying 3 stacks of Ablaze to a large  monster or enemy  champion, the fire becomes unstable, forming an area around the target that grants  sight and explodes after 2 seconds, consuming all stacks. All enemies within the detonation are dealt magic damage equal to 9% − 13% (based on level) of their maximum health (+ 2% per 100 AP) and applied a stack of Ablaze. The explosion will still occur if the target dies to the ability applying the third stack or during the delay.
2.html: Upon applying 3 stacks of Ablaze to a large monster or enemy champion, the fire becomes unstable, forming an area around the target that grants sight and explodes after 2 seconds, consuming all stacks. All enemies within the detonation are dealt magic damage equal to 9% − 13% (based on level) of their maximum health (+ 2% per 100 AP) and applied a stack of Ablaze. The explosion will still occur if the target dies to the ability applying the third stack or during the delay.
markedPassages: monster
champion
sight
9% − 13% (based on level) of their maximum health
9% − 13% (based on level) of their maximum health
possibleConcerningAbilities: The explosion will still occur if the target dies to the ability applying the third stack or during the delay.

3.text: Brand cannot stack Ablaze more than once on enemies who have exploded in the last 4 seconds.
3.html: Brand cannot stack Ablaze more than once on enemies who have exploded in the last 4 seconds.

0.text: Active: Brand launches a fireball in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.
0.html: Active: Brand launches a fireball in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.

1.text: Ablaze Bonus: The target is  stunned for 1.5 seconds.
1.html: Ablaze Bonus: The target is stunned for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: Ablaze
stunned

0.text: Active: After a 0.627 seconds delay, Brand erupts a pillar of flame at the target location that deals magic damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: After a 0.627 seconds delay, Brand erupts a pillar of flame at the target location that deals magic damage to enemies hit.

1.text: Ablaze Bonus: The target takes 25% increased damage.
1.html: Ablaze Bonus: The target takes 25% increased damage.
markedPassages: Ablaze

0.text: Active: Brand sets the target enemy aflame, which creates a blast that deals magic damage to them and nearby enemies.
0.html: Active: Brand sets the target enemy aflame, which creates a blast that deals magic damage to them and nearby enemies.

1.text: Ablaze Bonus: Conflagration's spread range is doubled.
1.html: Ablaze Bonus: Conflagration's spread range is doubled.
markedPassages: Ablaze

0.text: Active: Brand launches a fireball at the target enemy that bounces between nearby enemies and Brand up to four times, dealing magic damage to enemies each time.
0.html: Active: Brand launches a fireball at the target enemy that bounces between nearby enemies and Brand up to four times, dealing magic damage to enemies each time.

1.text: Pyroclasm prioritizes  ablazed enemy champions, then other enemy champions, then any valid bounce target, then Brand.
1.html: Pyroclasm prioritizes ablazed enemy champions, then other enemy champions, then any valid bounce target, then Brand.
markedPassages: ablazed
possibleConcerningAbilities: enemy champions, then other enemy champions, then any valid bounce target, then Brand.

2.text: The target does not have to be  visible for the fireball to bounce to them.
2.html: The target does not have to be visible for the fireball to bounce to them.
markedPassages: visible
possibleConcerningAbilities: The target does not have to be  visible for the fireball to bounce to them.

3.text: Ablaze Bonus: The target is  slowed for 0.25 seconds. This can affect the same enemy more than once.
3.html: Ablaze Bonus: The target is slowed for 0.25 seconds. This can affect the same enemy more than once.
markedPassages: Ablaze
slowed
